description.value: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage. In addition, it is immune to poison damage and to the poisoned condition.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s weapon attacks are magical. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 2d6 fire damage (included in the attack).
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gets up to five extra reactions, but these extra reactions can be used only for Parry.
The marilith makes two Dagger attacks, two Mace attacks, and two Longsword attacks. It can replace two Dagger attacks with a Tail attack.
Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @labels.reach]] or range [[lookup @labels.range]], one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @labels.reach]], one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @labels.reach]], one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, or [[/damage versatile average]] damage if used with two hands.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is &Reference[grappled]{grappled} (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained]{restrained}, the marilith can automatically hit the target with its Tail, and the marilith can’t make Tail attacks against other targets.

The marilith shouts one of the following commands at up to two friendly creatures it can see within 30 feet of it:

  • March! Each target can use a reaction to move up to half its speed in a direction of the marilith’s choice. This movement is unaffected by difficult terrain and doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.

  • Protect Yourself! Each target gains the marilith’s Parry reaction until the start of the marilith’s next turn.

  • Remember Your Training! Each target has advantage on the next weapon attack roll it makes before the start of the marilith’s next turn.
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Note: An Active Effect is available in the Effects tab of the character sheet to enable the AC bonus.
